title: Why the US Has No High-Speed Rail
description: A comprehensive look at why America fell behind on high-speed rail and what it would take to catch up with the rest of the world.

title: The Truth About California High-Speed Rail
description: Separating fact from fiction on California's ambitious HSR project - the costs, the timeline, and what's actually being built.

title: Japan's Bullet Train: The Shinkansen Story
description: How Japan built and perfected the world's first high-speed rail network, and the lessons for America.

title: California High-Speed Rail Construction Update
description: Latest progress on California HSR construction in the Central Valley, including viaduct work and station development.

title: Why We Need High-Speed Rail in America
description: The case for investing in passenger rail infrastructure and what it could mean for American cities and climate.

title: Riding the TGV Across France
description: Experience France's legendary high-speed train from Paris to the south, with stunning views and smooth travel.

title: Is High-Speed Rail Worth the Cost?
description: Breaking down the economics of high-speed rail versus highways and airports, including hidden subsidies and externalities.

title: Spain's Amazing High-Speed Rail Network
description: How Spain built the second-largest HSR network in the world and connected its major cities.

title: Inside a High-Speed Rail Train
description: A detailed look at the engineering and design of modern high-speed trains and what makes them so fast.
